name: diaspora - insomnia
description: This is work in progress user style, as Diaspora* is still in alpha land, so will this user style until the Diaspora* at least has a final release. So, there's a lot redundant stuff and the CSS needs a lot of cleaning up.
additional_info:
* 2013-05-20: Added support for new post Preview feature.
* 2013-05-19: Updated Inbox styles to reflect new changes.
* 2013-05-17: Support for a whole buncha' pods and updated styles to include notification menu.
